name: scraper
description: A tool for created to generate medical result as a pdf file.

scripts.tag: git tag -a v%npm_package_version%-%npm_config_env% -m "Release version %npm_package_version%" && git push origin --tags
scripts.start: echo "Please run the test 'npm run test' before running the app." && node app.js
scripts.build: docker build -f ./devtools/dockerfiles/ScraperApp -t  $npm_package_config_container_url/scraper-app:$npm_package_version-$npm_config_env . && docker build -f ./devtools/dockerfiles/ScraperQueue -t $npm_package_config_container_url/scraper-queue:$npm_package_version-$npm_config_env . && docker build -f ./devtools/dockerfiles/ScraperDashboard -t $npm_package_config_container_url/scraper-dashboard:$npm_package_version-$npm_config_env .
scripts.push: docker login $npm_package_config_container_url -u=$npm_package_config_container_username --password-stdin < .container.password && docker push $npm_package_config_container_url/scraper-app:$npm_package_version-$npm_config_env && docker push $npm_package_config_container_url/scraper-queue:$npm_package_version-$npm_config_env && docker push $npm_package_config_container_url/scraper-dashboard:$npm_package_version-$npm_config_env
scripts.deploy: kubectl delete deploy scraper-queue && kubectl delete deploy scraper-dashboard && kubectl delete deploy scraper-app && kubectl apply -f ./devtools/$npm_config_env/scraper-app.yaml

author: Nino Casupanan
